building_blocks

Class Waveguide

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.BuildingBlock
      • building_blocks.Waveguide

  • public class Waveguide
extends BuildingBlock
    Provides the waveguide building block. A waveguide is placed between two crossings or between a crossing and an input/output port. The waveguide could be an imput waveguide of a parallel PSE. In such a case, the microring resonator ID should be specified.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Waveguide(int id)
      Constructs a waveguide object given an identifier number.
      Waveguide(int id, int inputCrossingID, int outputCrossingID)
      Constructs a waveguide object connecting two waveguide crossings.
      Waveguide(int id, int inputCrossingID, int outputCrossingID, double length)
      Constructs a waveguide object connecting two waveguide crossings.

      • Waveguide

        public Waveguide(int id,
         int inputCrossingID,
         int outputCrossingID,
         double length)
        Constructs a waveguide object connecting two waveguide crossings.
        Parameters:
        id - the waveguide building block identifier number
        inputCrossingID - the input waveguide crossings ID
        outputCrossingID - the output waveguide crossings ID
        length - the length of this waveguide. This value is used to calculate the propagation loss.
